sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import Alert from 'react-bootstrap/Alert'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Avatar from '../../utilities/image/avatar.jpg'; import LogoWhite from '../../utilities/image/logo-white.svg'; import Logo from '../../utilities/image/Logo.svg'; import Galery from '../../utilities/image/avatarSitting.jpg'; import PorfolioItems from '../../utilities/data/porfolio'; import Item from '../itemList'; import Map from '../map'; import Aos from 'aos'; import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import CV from '../../utilities/CV/CV.pdf'; import { FaFacebookSquare, FaGithubSquare, FaInstagramSquare, FaLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fa'; import 'animate.css'; import '../../utilities/css/home.scss'; import BurgerMenu from '../burgermenu'; import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container'; import Nav from 'react-bootstrap/Nav'; import Navbar from 'react-bootstrap/Navbar'; import { Link as LinkScroll } from 'react-scroll'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home({ theme, changeTheme }) { const [category, setCategory] = useState('All'); const [pageStatus, setPageStatus] = useState('loading'); const [imageAnimation, setImageAnimation] = useState(''); const [showAlert, setShowAlert] = useState(''); const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const [morePost, setMorePost] = useState(false) const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); function downloadCV() { window.open("https://www.topcv.vn/xem-cv/XANeV1UCBgMGBgcGVAVWV1xRDQECUQlUDFNWAA2ae7?utm_source=link_i_topcv&utm_campaign=link_i_topcv&utm_medium=link_i_topcv"); } function sendEmail(e) { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( 'service_3ajhow6', 'template_1zqvd01', e.target, 'user_c4tjVaTONsGqWptiuOAK4' ) .then( (result) => { setShowAlert('success'); }, (error) => { setShowAlert('danger'); } ); e.target.reset(); } setTimeout(function () { setImageAnimation('animate'); }, 6000); setTimeout(function () { setPageStatus('running'); }, 5000); useEffect(() => { Aos.init({ duration: 2000 }); }, []); const categorizedPost = PorfolioItems.filter((item, index) => item.category.some((itemCategory) => (itemCategory === category))) console.log('categorizedPost', categorizedPost); return ( changeTheme()} >
Home About Portfolio Contact

) : ( <>
